Addressing heads of state on Jan. 30, the outgoing AU chair, Malawi President Bingu wa Mutharika , called on Gbagbo to respect the will of Ivorians and hand over power to Alassane Ouattara . The refusal by Mr. Gbagbo to respect the result in November 2010 elections in Cote d'Ivoire poses a serious threat to democracy in Africa, he said, adding that he wanted the African Union to maintain its suspension of C?te d'Ivoire's membership of the AU until Alassane Ouattara assumed power. Conflict But AU members are not entirely unanimously in support.
